casebody.data:
STATE
v.
JACOBS and McMILLIAN. No. 617A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Alexander McC. Peters, Karen Long, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of NC. C. Scott Holmes, Durham, for Curly Jacobs.

AMENDED

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of April 2006 by Defendant's Counsel to Withdraw as Appellate Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
